introduction: After a harrowing home invasion and kidnapping in 2015; a couple is accused of staging the ordeal when the woman reappears; haunting the couple with a new series of tortures.

This US adaptation set at a paper company in Scranton Pa.; has a similar documentary style to that of the Ricky Gervais-led British original. It features the staff of Dunder-Mifflin; a staff that includes characters based on characters from the British show.
